song.title: Razorback
song.info:
(C) Skaven 1998/1999
skaven@remedy.fi http://isis.yok.utu.fi/~skaven
This song was supposed to be my Music Contest 6 entry, but unfortunate events (=hospitalization) prevented me from partaking in it, and also from being a judge. I'm now releasing the song in the Return to Stage 9 musicdisk.
This is an early, original mix of the song; a newer, improved mix will appear in Epic Megagames' game Unreal Tournament. Check it out.
Samples obtained from:
- Treponem Pal: Higher - Think About Mutation: Virus - Hannu "Salomon" Salonen (thanks!) - Teque - Vocals by me. --- Kidding. (Thanks to General 6000)
----------------------------
Enter the mutant traitor Burning oh so bright In this corrupted nature I see no other light
- -
Addicted to radiation Fueled by your pain Aroused high by contamination Soothed by acid rain
- -
Mother nature lied to me; Betrayed on a killing spree Mother nature expelled me; What's the use now, that I'm free
-----------------------------
